articles.description: Liverpool's run without a Premier League defeat at Anfield came to an end after almost four years, but Chelsea did not lose a league game at Stamford Bridge from February 2004 until October 2008.
articles.content:
Jose Mourinho admits it is going to take something extra special to crack the 86-game unbeaten home record set by his Chelsea team.
Liverpool's long run without a Premier League defeat at Anfield ca… [+2485 chars]

articles.author: Nathan Bliss
articles.title: FIFA 21 TOTY Ultimate XI lineup confirmed and first FUT TOTY ratings unveiled - Mirror Online
articles.description: The FUT 21 TOTY Ultimate XI has today been confirmed by EA SPORTS, with Juventus striker Cristiano Ronaldo, Paris Saint-Germain forward Kylian Mbappe and Manchester United midfielder Bruno Fernandes all included, but Lionel Messi misses out.
articles.content:
The FUT 21 Team of the Year (TOTY) Ultimate XI has finally been confirmed, kicking off the biggest promo of the FUT calendar.
